CustomBehavior.Text:
There is a problem moving char to quest

 Please move your char to: SWAMP OF SORROWS
 and start bot.
Compiling Swamp of Sorrows Map Zone

CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for i=1,GetNumQuestLogEntries() do SelectQuestLogEntry(i); SetAbandonQuest(); AbandonQuest(); end
/run for i=0,4 do for j=1,GetContainerNumSlots(i)do l=GetContainerItemLink(i,j)if l then _,_,q=GetItemInfo(l)if q==0 or q==2 or q==3 then PickupContainerItem(i,j)PickupMerchantItem(0)end end end end
